threat: A local attacker could use this issue to possibly elevate their privileges.
A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to hang or crash, resulting in a denial of service.
A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.
